Literature.Title: Association of idealized amphiphiles and protease inhibitors: Conferring antimicrobial peptides with stable antibacterial activity under physiological conditions to combat multidrug-resistant bacteria
Literature.Author: Zhu Y, Li B, Xu W, Wang Y, Li G, Bi C, Shao C, Shan A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CVCC 503(MIC=8µM)
